description: Episode of Series "Through Australian eyes". Two programs from the series" Through Australian Eyes". In the first program Australian-born Jessie Thandi journeys to the Punjab region of India, her father's place of birth in a search for her own identity. In the second program Ellen Youie visits the small Cantonese village where her mother was born, and strengthens the ties she feels with her Chinese heritage.
